data.title: ‘Salaar'Buzz: Jyothika to be seen as Prabhas'sister in the high-octane actioner?
data.meta_description: If the ongoing speculations are anything to pass by, popular South actress Jyothika will be considered to essay a pivotal role alongside Prabhas in the upcoming pan-Indian project ‘Salaar'directed by KGF fame Prashanth Neel.Grapevine implies that the filmmaker has approached Jyothika in Chennai and
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

If the ongoing speculations are anything to pass by, popular South actress Jyothika will be considered to essay a pivotal role alongside Prabhas in the upcoming pan-Indian project ‘Salaar'directed by KGF fame Prashanth Neel.Grapevine implies that the filmmaker has approached Jyothika in Chennai and narrated the whole script to her. While the 43-year-old diva has reportedly liked the story and her character, she is yet to take a final call. If this news piece turns out to be true, the film will mark the comeback of Jo to Telugu cinema following the 2006 film ‘Shock '.

Meanwhile, from the past few months, there has been several speculations regarding the cast of Salaar. According to reports, KGF bombshell Srinidhi Shetty will be shaking her belly alongside Prabhas for a particular numbet. There were also rumours that the lead actor will be viewed as an army officer in a couple of sequences.

The maiden schedule of Salaar took devote the very first week of February at the coal mines in Ramagundam. The makers have shot a stunt sequence featuring Prabhas and a couple of fighters at the opencast mine. In the leaked clips, the pan-Indian superstar can be spotted in a tough avatar with a mustache and it looks like he is draped in a mechanic dress.

Billed as you of the very most immaculate action films to be made in Indian cinema, Salaar will feature the ‘Baahubali'actor in a black, violent role and to fit the bill, he has generated some muscle and acquired a beefed-up look. Gorgeous gal Shruti Haasan is essaying the leading lady in the film and based on reports, Kannada actor Madhu Guruswamy will be the antagonist.
